title: BlueTorrent 5.06 Bluetooth Advertising Marketing
description:
<a href="http://www.bttmedia.co.uk" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.bttmedia.co.uk</a>

Version 5.06 - Scheduling of Campaigns Feature added, Help File Update, various updates.

BlueTorrent5 is Bluetooth proximity marketing software for Windows XP. Recently developed, BlueTorrent rivals and usually surpasses many of the other Bluetooth Marketing programs in features, ease of use and stability.

Key features
============

* Complies with "Spam" regulations, sending is permission based.
* Send images, videos, text files, virtually any type of file.
* Send multiple files to multiple mobiles at the same time.
* Built-in vCard (Business Card) Editor.
* Built-in vCalendar Editor.
* Sophisticated, yet simple to use.
* Campaign Manager.
* Support for Windows XP and Vista.
* Full campaign statistics with graphs and percentages.
* Printable statistics graphs.
* Retry ignored messages until message is either declined or accepted.
* Won&#039;t spam a phone, once a message is accepted or rejected, that phone won&#039;t be contacted again.
* Autostart Campaign on Windows Load.
* Powerful auto-schedule feature.
